choose.when: SELECT p.no, p.title, p.contents, p.category_no, c.blog_id FROM category c, post p where c.no = p.category_no AND c.blog_id = #{blog_id};
choose.otherwise: SELECT p.no, p.title, p.contents, p.category_no, c.blog_id FROM category c, post p where c.no = p.category_no AND c.blog_id = #{blog_id} AND category_no = #{category_no};

mapper.delete: SELECT id FROM user where no = #{no};
